title: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once again to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: Simba, the lion cub who will grow up to be king, faces his destiny after the death of his father, Mufasa, and the betrayal of his uncle, Scar.

title: Joker
synopsis: In Gotham City, a failed comic turns to a life of crime and chaos, assuming the identity of the infamous Joker. His descent into madness provides a new perspective on society's failure to address mental health.

title: Frozen II
synopsis: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, and Sven journey into the enchanted forest to uncover the origin of Elsa's powers and save their kingdom.

title: Parasite
synopsis: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, leading to unexpected consequences that unravel both familiesâ€™ lives.
